src:
宇野昌磨　フリーのジャンプでミス連発　４度の転倒で８位…１人で涙

02 Nov 2019

　「フィギュアスケート・フランス杯」（２日、グルノーブル）
　男子フリーが行われ、前日のショートプログラムで４位と出遅れた平昌冬季五輪銀メダリストの宇野昌磨（トヨタ自動車）は４度の転倒もあり、１３６・７９点の合計２１５・８４点で８位に終わった。ネーサン・チェン（米国）が２９７・１６点で優勝した。
　五輪銀メダリストが苦しんでいる。宇野は冒頭の４回転サルコー、４回転フリップとミスが続くと、安定感があるはずのトリプルアクセル（３回転半）まで転倒。フリー自己ベスト（１９７・３６点）、合計自己ベスト（２８９・１２点）には遠く及ばず。ルール改正もあったため参考記録となるが、フリーの得点はシニアデビューイヤーである２０１５年以来最低となった。
　今季コーチ不在である宇野は、得点を見るキス・アンド・クライにひとりで座り、涙を流した。
text:
The official dollar closed at $ 63.35 and the CCL advanced to $ 80.53
In the futures market, the prices for the end of November and December were operated at $ 64.90 and $ 71.
02 Nov 2019 by Economy
The dollar for sale to the public rose 13 cents and closed at an average of $ 63.35 in another low-volume wheel, while in the week it fell $ 1.65 as a result of the measures adopted by the Central and that limited the purchase of foreign currency to a maximum of $ 200 per month.
In the wholesale sector, the US currency rose eight cents and ended at $ 59.75, while the weekly balance fell 25 cents.
The dollar counted with liquidation (CCL) whose operation closes later in coincidence with the stock market, was sold at $ 80.53, while the MEP dollar is trading at $ 76.35, which represented a rise of 0.1% and 0 , 1%, respectively.
Regarding the monetary policy rate, the BCRA validated a decrease of 97 basis points compared to Thursday's close at the end of 67%.
The total awarded was $ 164,776 million over maturities of $ 129,702 million and from this operation a liquidity contraction of $ 35,074 million was generated.
Gustavo Quintana, of PR Corredores de Cambio, said that in the first round of November, the US currency "advanced, pushed in part by the purchases of official banks." The volume operated in the cash segment was US $ 344 million and there were no operations in the MAE futures sector.
In the futures market at the end of November and December they operated at $ 64.90 and $ 71.
